basics.name: Nuvi Pannu
basics.label: Developer/Tech ♡er :heart_eyes_cat:
basics.summary: Nuvi is a highly motivated tech-support enthusiast with programming experience skilled in troubleshooting, analyzing and resolving complex technical issues. She has technical experience and exposure to programming as she is currently working as a software engineer at a startup. Nuvi uses GitHub very often on the job and loves the developers on there. She is deeply interested in interacting with people and talking about technical concepts while finding solutions to open-ended problems. She also enjoys writing with an empathetic yet unique voice and is able to do it in a clear and concise manner. Nuvi is really passionate about helping people and improving people’s lives with the use of innovative products.

work.summary: MotiveMetrics is an on-demand SaaS platform that features a unique motivational analysis technology productizes 60+ years of research in psychology and human decision-making
highlights: Worked closely with the engineering team to track down bugs and improve documentation on GitHub
Implemented server-side unit testing for quality assurance and software functionality of API
Designed, tested, and debugged the TipTap stand alone app to create personality profile analyses
Practiced active listening and empathetic responding while counseling patients on their medications
Consulted with hundreds of physicians and patients to fill prescriptions, reviewe side effects, discuss drug interactions and resolve medication delivery problems to provide great customer service
Recognized for ability to manage high volume of patient accounts using proprietary software
Improved drug-inventory management system to reduce waste and eliminate back orders

volunteer.position: Stand alone app built while working at MotiveMetrics
volunteer.summary: Web application that analyzes users text to create individual personality profiles using a science-validated mathematical model and allows them to learn about themselves, how they communicate, compare their personalities to online identities, or see how similar they are to their friends
highlights: Developed and designed the app using Javascript, HTML, and CSS with Meteor.js framework
Engineered text data to be analyzed and expressed in a mathematical model of personality traits
Wrote server-side code to store text and user data from MongoDB in the API server (Couchbase)
Reduced the time to render the user's buddy list by 75% by implementing asynchronous algorithmn

volunteer.summary: Web application that allows users to search for Youtube channels & videos by keywords and then view comments made by users in a populated list.
highlights: Developed the app using Javascript, HTML, and CSS with Meteor.js framework
Designed the app using Semantic UI and Bootstrap to enhance the UI/UX presentation
Utilized Youtube API to query channels, videos, comments, and users for data expression
Implemented a MongoDB database collection for storing usernames and their comments

volunteer.summary: Web application that allows users to view Instagram photos posted near their current location in real time
highlights: Integrated Google Maps API to display a map to a user showing their up-to-date geographic location
Utilized Instagram API to query photos by user’s geolocation and plotted photos on the community map
Designed the front-end views for the GPS map and the Instagram thumbnail gallery using Meteor.js
Implemented a MongoDB database collection for storing usernames and their encrypted passwords
Created the search and navigation bar, user form page, and the UI/UX using Bootstrap and HTML
Architected authentication for API's using OAuth2 and JSON web tokens

volunteer.summary: Recommendations platform which lets individuals rate films and then predicts how others will rate that film
highlights: Used a pearson correlation machine learning algorithm to calculate the pearson score based on the difference of two ratings in order to predict how other users will rate a certain movie
Incorporated Python ORM using SQLAlchemy to query MovieLen’s database, and populated custom SQL tables with their data
Created a login form and routing page that handles a user's submission of the form with Python Flask

courses: Developed complex relational databases used to store applications' data, secured and configured Linux-based servers and built complete web application projects using Python, Javascript, HTML and CSS.

Python, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, SQL/ORMs, Flask, Git, CLI, data structures and algorithms, pair programming, scrum and agile development. Learned and practiced the fundamentals of computer science, full-stack web development, engineering empathy and deploying multiple fully-functional applications.

education.area: (Earned certificates with distinction in all courses)

references.name: Dilbag Singh, Engineering Mananger at Western Digital
references.reference: Nuvi is a very hardworking and intelligent person. She has worked hard to transform herself from a College graduate to train in a an area that she feels she can best contribute to in a passionate way. Given the right opportunity with an employer that can harness her skills and develop her career, I believe she would excel. She has shown me several example of her very impressive projects.

references.name: Matthew Jesuele, Cofounder/CTO at Mooch
references.reference: I've had the pleasure of both teaching and working with Nuvi on several occasions now, and I'm impressed by her smarts and her drive. I have no doubt that she will give 110% of her considerable capacity to whatever she does.

references.name: Steven Shyun, Director of Marketing and Outreach
references.reference: Nuvi is an extremely hard and thorough worker. I've had the pleasure of working with Nuvi at Outco. She has great problem solving abilities and knows how to break down a large complex problem into many smaller problems. She is professional and results-oriented, but is also a fun, active person to have around too.
